trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around May 10th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsobserved a large brightly lit object in the distance . this object was abright light green in the front of the object and a bright yellow to the rear. the object crossed west to ease in the sky. it appeared to be going down and disappeared over the horizon. this object , at that distance, appeared to be the size of a saucer, the type kids slide on, during the winter. would like to know if any one else reported this incident. i have not seen anyrthing on the news or in the papers i was on my way to work and had just passed the state police barracks in Cheshire Ma. i first noticed the object as it appeared from behind a tree in the southern sky. i had no idea what it was .i knew it was not a plane. it was too large and the colors were brilliant. i was wondering if it was going to crash., as it aappeared to be descending. it continued moving east and disappeared behind a mountain range.
Summary: brilliantly lit object moving west to east and extremely low in southern sky
